title: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
summary: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem (stylized as  AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem) is a 2007 American science fiction action film[5] directed by the Brothers Strause (Colin and Greg Strause) in their directorial debut and written by Shane Salerno. The film stars Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth, John Ortiz, Johnny Lewis and Ariel Gade.
